name: RougeStrike v001
description:
Use "a" to move your selection left, and "d" to move right. Spacebar buys/plays the card. Press "enter" to advance to the next phase. Buy cards from phases 1-5, and play them on phase 6. Every round 2 random cards are unavailable

The cards in order are

$1 - Deal 2 damage to the enemy once

 $2 - Deal 1 damage to the enemy thrice 

$1 - Get 2 more dollars at the start of next round

$2 - Double a cards Damage 

$3 - Make the next 2 cards you play perform their actions twice (does not work on itself)
